record.id: name="HP Elitebook Folio 1040 Laptop ENI" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: HP Elitebook Folio 1040 Laptop ENI - en
record.name: HP Elitebook Folio 1040 Laptop ENI
record.description: HP Elitebook Folio 1040 Laptop. The world's thinnest 14-inch diagonal business-class notebook. The sophisticated style of the world's thinnest 14-inch diagonal business-class notebook complements its innovative performance, security, and manageability features. (ENI)
record.detailedDescription:
The world's thinnest 14-inch diagonal business-class notebook.
The sophisticated style of the world's thinnest 14-inch diagonal business-class notebook complements its innovative performance, security, and manageability features.

Carry less. Do more.
Work confidently with the thin, elegant and durable HP EliteBook 1040 with a polished diamond-cut CNC aluminum body and premium keyboard.

Performance to get the job done
Enjoy thin and light enterprise class design with Windows 10 Pro2 and 6th Gen Intel® Core™ processors3 allowing you to work, surf, and connect with colleagues.

Collaborate in style
The HP Elitebook 1040 is a Skype for Business11 certified PC and comes with audio by Bang & Olufsen, HP Noise Reduction Software and HP Clear Sound Amp to provide a rich collaboration experience wherever you work.

More information on: http://store.hp.com/us/en/mdp/business-solutions/elitebook-folio-14
